title: Louisville Makes Games Video Tutorials
description: In 2020, due to the pandemic, I helped facilitate a new direction for Louisville Makes Games' education program â€“ providing free online video tutorial content.

title: Louisville Makes Games Summer Classes
description: In 2017 I had a major role in the development and teaching of a free 6-week summer program at Warp Zone Louisville to give kids a taste of the many disciplines of game development including: coding, story, art & animation, music & sound, and game design.

title: Velocity Kids
description: In 2014 I taught a monthly game development workshop at Velocity Indiana for youth ages 11 - 18 as part of their code education program.
